page.title: 13A Day at Tregolls School
page.content: We have to be at school by 8.50 and we go into assembly at about 9.05.We have a special way into our school where no cars can go to make it safer for us and it is marked with a yellow line.My first lesson is Maths.and usually after playtime we have some kind of English like Topics or Cloze work or Spelling.On Tuesday afternoon we have Games a like cricket or rounders.I am captain of the cricket team and we haven't lost a match for 5 years.When we come in from the field at about 2.15 we have another lesson like handwriting and poetry and we finish at 3.30.Mr. Lloyd takes us for cricket or football practice after school.One of my favourite lessons is Science.This year we built sand yachts,mangonels and ballistas.Last year they built a big go-cart.I like my school,it's great.
